description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Windows Media Player osksupport.dll (UACMe 32) Author: Christian Burkard. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: UAC Bypass Using Windows Media Player - Process
query: (IntegrityLevel:("High" OR "System") AND (process.executable:"C\:\\Program\ Files\\Windows\ Media\ Player\\osk.exe" OR (process.executable:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\cmd.exe" AND process.parent.command_line:"\"C\:\\Windows\\system32\\mmc.exe\"\ \"C\:\\Windows\\system32\\eventvwr.msc\"\ \/s")))
